org.vertx.java.core.eventbus.impl.hazelcast

Class HazelcastClusterManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.vertx.java.core.eventbus.impl.hazelcast.HazelcastClusterManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ClusterManager

    public class HazelcastClusterManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements ClusterManager
    A cluster manager based on a HazelcastInstance singleton.

    Please be aware of the typical issues with singletons. E.g. all junit tests will share a single instance and the data (subsMap).

      • getConfig

        protected com.hazelcast.config.Config getConfig(java.lang.String configfile)
        Get the Hazelcast config
        Parameters:
        configfile - May be null in which case it gets the default (cluster.xml) will be used.
        Returns:

      • getSubsMap

        public SubsMap getSubsMap(java.lang.String name)
        Every eventbus handler has an ID. SubsMap (subscriber map) is a MultiMap which maps handler-IDs with server-IDs and thus allows the eventbus to determine where to send messages.
        Specified by:
        getSubsMap in interface ClusterManager
        Parameters:
        name - A unique name by which the the MultiMap can be identified within the cluster. See the cluster config file (e.g. cluster.xml in case of HazelcastClusterManager) for additional MultiMap config parameters.
        Returns:

      • close

        public void close()
        Because it implements a singleton, close() needs to be a noop
        Specified by:
        close in interface ClusterManager

      • getInstance

        public com.hazelcast.core.HazelcastInstance getInstance()
        Provide access to the singleton Hazelcast instance, e.g. to properly close it.
        Returns:
